Using knitractive with Perl

Jeroen Janssens

2017-11-06

View the corresponding perl.Rmd file.

To exit type 'exit' or '^D'
> sub hello($name = "World") {
*   say "Hello, $name!"
* }
sub hello ($name = "World") { #`(Sub|91737096) ... }

> hello()
Hello, World!
> hello('You')
Hello, You!
